item.title: Performance tuning and best practices in a Knative based, large-scale serverless platform with Istio
item.description: Istio is the default networking layer solution of Knative and it is leveraged for routing, traffic splitting, security and so on. We’re now building a large-scale, multi-tenant serverless platform on top of Knative and Istio. While building it, one of the main questions was how to tune Istio together with Knative so it can unleash the maximum scalability and performance. In this session, we will share how we detected performance bottlenecks using difficult but fruitful analysis processes, tuned and optimized Istio and our platform, and eventually reduced over 90% latency in Knative service provision scenario.
